Name: Midnight Calling: Wise Dragon Collector's Edition
About the game: Elephant Games brings you a thrilling new adventure in Midnight Calling: Wise Dragon! A letter from your father leads you to your hometown. When you arrive, you find it in flames! Your only hope is to decipher your father’s research and find the Wise Dragon, but are they a friend or a foe? With the clock ticking, it’s up to you to find out! Do you have what it takes to battle against evil to save your people from destruction? Find out in this riveting hidden-object puzzle adventure game! • Bargain with the Sphinx in the bonus chapter! • Unlock the Super Puzzle challenge in the Secret Room! • Find collectible dragons and assemble a bonus fresco painting! • Earn achievements and enjoy exclusive music and artwork! • Never get lost with the strategy guide!
